settings.text:
At Delforno, we offer bathroom design, supply and installation. Our expert team of bathroom consultants offer 100 years of collective experience and can help with the design and planning of your ideal bathroom. Our Bathroom Consultation is tailored for each customer and is available for projects of all sizes.

From small bathroom designs, to luxury bathroom projects, our team will work with you and help you to discover what options are best suited for your needs and style. Let us build your dream bathroom from the ground up.

Our Showroom is an impresssive 52,000 square feet and can be a great source of inspiration for your renovation project, so book a consulation with our team today.

settings.title: Preparation
settings.content: Gather images of bathroom styles you like and would like to emulate in your home. These can be photos from our website, Pinterest, Instagram, or from anywhere else you may have been inspired. Send these to us ahead of your consultation along with images of your current bathroom and its measurements.

settings.title: Create Your Dream Bathroom
settings.content: We will work with you to design and plan your bathroom renovation and make the process as smooth as possible.

settings.title: What you can expect
settings.content: Share information about your brand with your customers.

settings.text:
THE BRIEF
To create a family friendly bathroom with a classic luxurious feel.

PROJECT BACKGROUND
This project wasn't straight forward as the space was small and piping and plumbing had to be factored in.

settings.title: how many people are going to be using the bathroom?
settings.content: A family bathroom has different demands than a guest bathroom. So you need to think about about how many people are going to use the bathroom now and in the future. An example would be, a double washbasin is the perfect option for two family members that will be simultaneously getting ready in the mornings. If there are children in your home, then low-maintenance materials would be an advantage. Tiles are significantly easier and quicker to clean than wood panelling or wallpaper. You should also consider how much storage space you need before choosing your bathroom furniture.

settings.title: WHat do you want in your bathroom?
settings.content: Having a basic idea of the bathware you want in your bathroom i.e do you want a shower or bath? Or what colour taps or radiator you'd like? Details like these make a huge difference to the planning process. It will help our experts guide you on the best products for your budget and style. It can also aid with building any layout options for your space.

settings.title: Style inspiration
settings.content: Renovationg your bathroom is the perfect time to completely change it's style. So before the planning process starts, Send or bring any images you have of rooms you like. Styles that you'd like to emulate in your bathroom. They can be of colour scheme, tile patterns, full bathrooms or even just bathware pieces you like. The more you have, the easier the process should be. Pinterest, magazines, Instagram and even our Showroom can be great sources of inspiration.

settings.title: Do you need an accessible bathroom?
settings.content: Accessibility is a very important factor to take into consideration when designing your bathroom. Your bathroom should be convenient, comfortable and fit for purpose. Do you need a walk-in shower, a grab rail or bath seat? We can incorporate practical elements like these in to the look you hope to achive.

settings.title: What are your measurements?
settings.content: In order to get an idea of the size and scale of your bathroom and to keep proposed plans realistic, it is important for you to send our team on the measurements of your current bathroom and if possible some photos. These will help us visualise possibilites and offer you the best plan possible.

settings.title: Tips to help you prepare for your consultation
Book a Bathroom Consultation
settings.content: Walk-ins are welcome, but to avoid disappointment book a consultation using the form below if you wish to meet with a member of the Bathroom Team.
settings.form_title: Let us help you create the bathroom of your dreams
